name: Gunlance
description:
Notice: This is a project made for the Student Enterprise Programme in Ireland, by three teenagers: Conor (lead developer), Fergal (composer) and Thomas (social media manager). We had a close deadline, but with tutorials, blind luck, and a lot of incompetency, we made it! We have...a release!

In Gunlance, you control a little white person named Gunner. Why is he called Gunner? Fateful irony. Does he have a gun? Yep! Use your wide variety of movement capabilities to navigate around this build's levels, whether precisely with the gun, or quickly with a dive. Hell, you can even jump after diving for some extra style!

Controls:

Space - Jump/Dive Jump

WASD - Movement

Shift - Dive

Down Arrow - Shoot

Don't worry if you're slightly disappointed in what we have so far, we will be frequently patching the game with updates and general polish, so not only can we make a game worth purchasing, but also a game that's just...fun!
